document.full_text: the yemeni al qaeda militant pakistan arrested in the city of karachi was a "mid-level" operative and explosives expert involved in plotting attacks in pakistan and afghanistan, security officials in pakistan said on wednesday.
document.title: yemeni caught in pakistan is al qaeda operative: officials
lines_and_colors: the yemeni al qaeda militant pakistan arrested in the city of karachi was a "mid-level" operative and explosives expert involved in plotting attacks in pakistan and afghanistan, security officials in pakistan said on wednesday.
